name: Yarnball
description:
Move the ground up and down to roll your ball of yarn around!

Collect the powerups and avoid the cats!

Use Left Mouse Button to raise the ground and Right Mouse Button to lower it.

My entry to Ludum Dare 49. You can rate it here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/yarnball

(MacOS and Linux versions are untested - please let me know if they need to be fixed in any way)
